description: React component for a Contact section including a contact form and social links, handling form submission, validation, and external links.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Validates the contact form data, checking for name, email format, message length, and spam honeypot.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles the contact form submission, performs validation, manages UI state, and interacts with the submitContact API.

methods.name: IconButton
methods.description: A React component rendering an icon link, opening in new tab if URL is external.
